title: Breaking boundaries: Litecoin (LTC) achieves historic milestone as halving event approaches
description: Litecoin, the renowned cryptocurrency often called “Digital Silver,” has achieved a remarkable milestone, surpassing a previously unattainable barrier of 170 million network transactions.
